AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: TESTINGONLY2 Add Form
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Used for adding a new TESTINGONLY
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: memphis-PC\Administrator

SaveImplementation.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_TESTINGONLY ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @TESTMEMO nvarchar(max) = '', @TESTINGTEXT nvarchar(50) = '' ) as
set nocount on;
if @ID is null set @ID = newid()
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try -- handle inserting the data insert into dbo.USR_TESTINGONLY (ID, TESTMEMO, TESTINGTEXT, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) values (@ID, @TESTMEMO, @TESTINGTEXT, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE) end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0
